channel.title: Few Questions
channel.description:
Okay here we go..
[s]1) How do I make people Mods/Admins on my server[/s].
[s]2) How do i change the name on the top of the screen and on the log out screen from "Satan's Isle" to the name of my server.[/s]
[s]3) Can i move the training room from karamja to some other place, and if so how.[/s] 4) How do i get commands to work.
[s]5) And Lastly, Will port forwarding do anything to my computer/router (Slowing down the speed of my internet/computer or anything like that)[/s]
Thanks :) I'll Check back in a few hours ;)
[s]EDIT:
2 more questions:
[s]1) How do i change the amour of experience you get when you train?
2) How/Can I (this is a stupid question :P ) Make it so the co-owners have a different color'ed crown next to their name?[/s]

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @t_cups t cups
item.description:
@t_cups wrote:

[quote=“Wildcat_240, post:9, topic:109204”]case 2873:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You train Attack !”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2068);
addSkillXP((65*playerLevel[0]), 0);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;[/quote]

addSkillXP((65*playerLevel[0]), 0); change the 65 to whatever the number should be…

lemme find mine and show you.

replace it with this…may help?

case 823:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You punch the dummy and recieve attack xp!”);
setAnimation(0x326);
addSkillXP((15000playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((15000playerLevel[3]), 3);
actionTimer = 50;
}
break;

Read full topic

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @t_cups t cups
item.description:
@t_cups wrote:

[quote=“Wildcat_240, post:1, topic:109204”]Okay here we go…

1) How do I make people Mods/Admins on my server.

2) How do i change the name on the top of the screen and on the log out screen from “Satan’s Isle” to the name of my server.

  1. Can i move the training room from karamja to some other place, and if so how.

  2. How do i get commands to work.

  3. And Lastly, Will port forwarding do anything to my computer/router (Slowing down the speed of my internet/computer or anything like that)

Thanks I’ll Check back in a few hours

EDIT:

2 more questions:

  1. How do i change the amour of experience you get when you train?

  2. How/Can I (this is a stupid question ) Make it so the co-owners have a different color’ed crown next to their name?[/quote]

  1. you can move the training room except you must have done fedexers global object tutorial.
  2. look for existing commands in your source client.java ill teach that after.
  3. i dont think you can change their crown, if you can, i have never seen a tutorial, srry

Extra answers:

  1. to change the amount of experience look for example: when you hit the dummy you get the text right? so look for that text in the client.java folder and change the multiplier to a number higher than what it already is.
  2. Port forwarding will slow your computer down a tad. nothing to worry about…well depends on your computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Few Questions

item.description:

thank you SO much you’ve really helped…but I still don’t completely understand the whole moving the training area part

Read full topic

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @fatcat2248 fatcat2248
item.description:
@fatcat2248 wrote:

if u wana open cfg files just right click on the file then go to open with and open it with notepad[br][size=1]Posted on: June 11, 2007, 03:11:04 PM[/size][hr]as for ur other questions.

to move the training room to karamja or something like that you would need to firstly change the command to the new tele co ords then you would have to tell the client.java what items to click on to give you exp.

to get commands to work u gotta write em (there quite a few programmes on here which will do that for you)

post forwarding does nothing to you computer all it is, is an exception to your routers firewall which allows inbound and outbound traffic.

to change the ammout of experience you get when u train open up the client.java search for TRAINING and under the object that is set to train you should see a number in brackets, the higher that is the easier it is to train

and your last question… i dont think thats possible unless ur co owner was a mod and u are a admin

gd luck
-fatcat-

Read full topic

for number 1 to change experence it is in the file called client.java in your server thing might take about …10-20 mins to find i did it today, and for number 2 u cant for co owners thats like somthing u cant do. for number 5 no it will just let in the port number for that server for 4 i do not know how to i forget, and for 3 … i’ve heard u can i just dont know how … ok well theres some for u gone

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @Crispp Crispp
item.description:
@Crispp wrote:

  1. How do I make people Mods/Admins on my server. [b]Open Characters File and search for the name what you want to make mod typ at playerrights 1 OR 2 OR 3

1 = Mod
2 = Admin
3 = Co-Owner[/b]

  1. How do i change the name on the top of the screen and on the log out screen from “Satan’s Isle” to the name of my server.
    Open Client.java and pres CTRL + F look for Satan’s Isle and change it everywhere to your server name

Read full topic
